summary:
Sploofy Personal Smoke Filter - Sploofy is the first ever personal air filter with an eco-friendly, replaceable cartridge system. The filter cartridge features a zero plastic housing. Our cartridges guaranteed to last longer than any other filter in its class.

 Sploofy Pro II - Sploofy Pro II is equipped with our industry leading replaceable cartridge system making it compatible with the Original Sploofy cartridges. The main difference in design with the Pro II is our rubber mouthpiece which allows for a better seal.

 Sploofy Pro - Sploofy Pro is our latest personal smoke air filter. Sploofy Pro is equipped with our industry leading replaceable cartridge system making it compatible with the Original Sploofy cartridges. The main difference in design with the Pro is that the mouthpiece is now placed on top, allowing more moisture to escape while the device is not in use.

 Original Sploofy Personal Smoke Filter - Improved filter capacity, Biodegradable filter housing, 3 piece design. Includes mouthpiece, protective cover, and cartridge.
